original_solution_mapping.L2: After Moses takes $20, there will be $50-$20 = $<<50-20=30>>30 left
original_solution_mapping.L3: Tony and Esther will split $30 equally among themselves so each of them will get $30/2 = $<<30/2=15>>15

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5841.
    Returns: the difference in amount Moses gets compared to Esther.
    """
    # L1
    moses_percentage = Fraction(40, 100) # 40% of the total amount
    total_amount = 50 # share $50
    moses_share = moses_percentage * total_amount

    # L2
    remainder = total_amount - moses_share

    # L3
    num_people_splitting = 2 # Tony and Esther will split the remainder equally among themselves
    tony_esther_share = remainder / num_people_splitting

    # L4
    difference = moses_share - tony_esther_share

    # FA
    answer = difference
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: After Moses takes ${moses_share}, there will be ${total_amount}-${moses_share} = $<<{total_amount}-{moses_share}={remainder}>>{remainder} left

Tony and Esther will split ${remainder} equally among themselves so each of them will get ${remainder}/{num_people_splitting} = $<<{remainder}/{num_people_splitting}={tony_esther_share}>>{tony_esther_share}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: After Moses takes $20, there will be $50-$20 = $<<50-20=30>>30 left
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Tony and Esther will split $30 equally among themselves so each of them will get $30/30 = $<<30/30=1>>1

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'remainder' (30) was used instead of 'num_people_splitting' (2).
